00055         Data(_mm_set_ps(w, z, y, x))

00061 
00062 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER fquatSIMD::fquatSIMD(vec3 const & eulerAngles)
00063 {
00064     vec3 c = glm::cos(eulerAngles * 0.5f);
00065         vec3 s = glm::sin(eulerAngles * 0.5f);
00066 
00067     Data = _mm_set_ps(
00068         (c.x * c.y * c.z) + (s.x * s.y * s.z),
00069         (c.x * c.y * s.z) - (s.x * s.y * c.z),
00070         (c.x * s.y * c.z) + (s.x * c.y * s.z),
00071         (s.x * c.y * c.z) - (c.x * s.y * s.z));
00072 }

00078 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER fquatSIMD& fquatSIMD::operator=(fquatSIMD const & q)
00079 {
00080     this->Data = q.Data;
00081     return *this;

00084 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER fquatSIMD& fquatSIMD::operator*=(float const & s)
00085 {
00086         this->Data = _mm_mul_ps(this->Data, _mm_set_ps1(s));
00087         return *this;
00088 }
00089 
00090 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER fquatSIMD& fquatSIMD::operator/=(float const & s)
00091 {
00092         this->Data = _mm_div_ps(Data, _mm_set1_ps(s));
00093         return *this;
00094 }

00098 // negate operator
00099 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER fquatSIMD operator- (fquatSIMD const & q)
00100 {
00101     return fquatSIMD(_mm_mul_ps(q.Data, _mm_set_ps(-1.0f, -1.0f, -1.0f, -1.0f)));
00102 }

00104 // operator+
00105 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER fquatSIMD operator+ (fquatSIMD const & q1, fquatSIMD const & q2)
00106 {
00107         return fquatSIMD(_mm_add_ps(q1.Data, q2.Data));
00108 }
00109 
00110 //operator*
00111 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER fquatSIMD operator* (fquatSIMD const & q1, fquatSIMD const & q2)
00112 {
00113     // SSE2 STATS:
00114     //    11 shuffle
00115     //    8  mul
00116     //    8  add
00117     
00118     // SSE4 STATS:
00119     //    3 shuffle
00120     //    4 mul
00121     //    4 dpps
00122 
00123     __m128 mul0 = _mm_mul_ps(q1.Data, _mm_shuffle_ps(q2.Data, q2.Data, _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 1, 2, 3)));
00124     __m128 mul1 = _mm_mul_ps(q1.Data, _mm_shuffle_ps(q2.Data, q2.Data, _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 0, 3, 2)));
00125     __m128 mul2 = _mm_mul_ps(q1.Data, _mm_shuffle_ps(q2.Data, q2.Data, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 3, 0, 1)));
00126     __m128 mul3 = _mm_mul_ps(q1.Data, q2.Data);
00127 
00128 #   if((GLM_ARCH & GLM_ARCH_SSE4))
00129     __m128 add0 = _mm_dp_ps(mul0, _mm_set_ps(1.0f, -1.0f,  1.0f,  1.0f), 0xff);
00130     __m128 add1 = _mm_dp_ps(mul1, _mm_set_ps(1.0f,  1.0f,  1.0f, -1.0f), 0xff);
00131     __m128 add2 = _mm_dp_ps(mul2, _mm_set_ps(1.0f,  1.0f, -1.0f,  1.0f), 0xff);
00132     __m128 add3 = _mm_dp_ps(mul3, _mm_set_ps(1.0f, -1.0f, -1.0f, -1.0f), 0xff);
00133 #   else
00134            mul0 = _mm_mul_ps(mul0, _mm_set_ps(1.0f, -1.0f,  1.0f,  1.0f));
00135     __m128 add0 = _mm_add_ps(mul0, _mm_movehl_ps(mul0, mul0));
00136            add0 = _mm_add_ss(add0, _mm_shuffle_ps(add0, add0, 1));
00137 
00138            mul1 = _mm_mul_ps(mul1, _mm_set_ps(1.0f,  1.0f,  1.0f, -1.0f));
00139     __m128 add1 = _mm_add_ps(mul1, _mm_movehl_ps(mul1, mul1));
00140            add1 = _mm_add_ss(add1, _mm_shuffle_ps(add1, add1, 1));
00141 
00142            mul2 = _mm_mul_ps(mul2, _mm_set_ps(1.0f,  1.0f, -1.0f,  1.0f));
00143     __m128 add2 = _mm_add_ps(mul2, _mm_movehl_ps(mul2, mul2));
00144            add2 = _mm_add_ss(add2, _mm_shuffle_ps(add2, add2, 1));
00145 
00146            mul3 = _mm_mul_ps(mul3, _mm_set_ps(1.0f, -1.0f, -1.0f, -1.0f));
00147     __m128 add3 = _mm_add_ps(mul3, _mm_movehl_ps(mul3, mul3));
00148            add3 = _mm_add_ss(add3, _mm_shuffle_ps(add3, add3, 1));
00149 #endif
00150 
00151 
00152     // This SIMD code is a politically correct way of doing this, but in every test I've tried it has been slower than
00153     // the final code below. I'll keep this here for reference - maybe somebody else can do something better...
00154     //
00155     //__m128 xxyy = _mm_shuffle_ps(add0, add1, _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00156     //__m128 zzww = _mm_shuffle_ps(add2, add3, _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00157     //
00158     //return _mm_shuffle_ps(xxyy, zzww, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 2, 0));
00159     
00160     float x;
00161     float y;
00162     float z;
00163     float w;
00164 
00165     _mm_store_ss(&x, add0);
00166     _mm_store_ss(&y, add1);
00167     _mm_store_ss(&z, add2);
00168     _mm_store_ss(&w, add3);
00169 
00170     return detail::fquatSIMD(w, x, y, z);
00171 }
00172 
00173 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER fvec4SIMD operator* (fquatSIMD const & q, fvec4SIMD const & v)
00174 {
00175     static const __m128 two = _mm_set1_ps(2.0f);
00176 
00177     __m128 q_wwww  = _mm_shuffle_ps(q.Data, q.Data, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00178     __m128 q_swp0  = _mm_shuffle_ps(q.Data, q.Data, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 0, 2, 1));
00179         __m128 q_swp1  = _mm_shuffle_ps(q.Data, q.Data, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 1, 0, 2));
00180         __m128 v_swp0  = _mm_shuffle_ps(v.Data, v.Data, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 0, 2, 1));
00181         __m128 v_swp1  = _mm_shuffle_ps(v.Data, v.Data, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 1, 0, 2));
00182         
00183         __m128 uv      = _mm_sub_ps(_mm_mul_ps(q_swp0, v_swp1), _mm_mul_ps(q_swp1, v_swp0));
00184     __m128 uv_swp0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(uv, uv, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 0, 2, 1));
00185     __m128 uv_swp1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(uv, uv, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 1, 0, 2));
00186     __m128 uuv     = _mm_sub_ps(_mm_mul_ps(q_swp0, uv_swp1), _mm_mul_ps(q_swp1, uv_swp0));
00187 
00188     
00189     uv  = _mm_mul_ps(uv,  _mm_mul_ps(q_wwww, two));
00190     uuv = _mm_mul_ps(uuv, two);
00191 
00192     return _mm_add_ps(v.Data, _mm_add_ps(uv, uuv));
00193 }
00194 
00195 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER fvec4SIMD operator* (fvec4SIMD const & v, fquatSIMD const & q)
00196 {
00197         return glm::inverse(q) * v;
00198 }

00221 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER quat quat_cast
00222 (
00223         detail::fquatSIMD const & x
00224 )
00225 {
00226         GLM_ALIGN(16) quat Result;
00227         _mm_store_ps(&Result[0], x.Data);
00228 
00229         return Result;
00230 }
00231 
00232 template <typename T>
00233 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::fquatSIMD quatSIMD_cast_impl(const T m0[], const T m1[], const T m2[])
00234 {
00235     T trace = m0[0] + m1[1] + m2[2] + T(1.0);
00236     if (trace > T(0))
00237     {
00238         T s = static_cast<T>(0.5) / sqrt(trace);
00239 
00240         return _mm_set_ps(
00241             static_cast<float>(T(0.25) / s),
00242             static_cast<float>((m0[1] - m1[0]) * s),
00243             static_cast<float>((m2[0] - m0[2]) * s),
00244             static_cast<float>((m1[2] - m2[1]) * s));
00245     }
00246     else
00247     {
00248         if (m0[0] > m1[1])
00249         {
00250             if (m0[0] > m2[2])
00251             {
00252                 // X is biggest.
00253                 T s = sqrt(m0[0] - m1[1] - m2[2] + T(1.0)) * T(0.5);
00254 
00255                 return _mm_set_ps(
00256                     static_cast<float>((m1[2] - m2[1]) * s),
00257                     static_cast<float>((m2[0] + m0[2]) * s),
00258                     static_cast<float>((m0[1] + m1[0]) * s),
00259                     static_cast<float>(T(0.5)          * s));
00260             }
00261         }
00262         else
00263         {
00264             if (m1[1] > m2[2])
00265             {
00266                 // Y is biggest.
00267                 T s = sqrt(m1[1] - m0[0] - m2[2] + T(1.0)) * T(0.5);
00268 
00269                 return _mm_set_ps(
00270                     static_cast<float>((m2[0] - m0[2]) * s),
00271                     static_cast<float>((m1[2] + m2[1]) * s),
00272                     static_cast<float>(T(0.5)          * s),
00273                     static_cast<float>((m0[1] + m1[0]) * s));
00274             }
00275         }
00276 
00277         // Z is biggest.
00278         T s = sqrt(m2[2] - m0[0] - m1[1] + T(1.0)) * T(0.5);
00279 
00280         return _mm_set_ps(
00281             static_cast<float>((m0[1] - m1[0]) * s),
00282             static_cast<float>(T(0.5)          * s),
00283             static_cast<float>((m1[2] + m2[1]) * s),
00284             static_cast<float>((m2[0] + m0[2]) * s));
00285     }
00286 }
00287 
00288 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::fquatSIMD quatSIMD_cast
00289 (
00290         detail::fmat4x4SIMD const & m
00291 )
00292 {
00293     // Scalar implementation for now.
00294     GLM_ALIGN(16) float m0[4];
00295     GLM_ALIGN(16) float m1[4];
00296     GLM_ALIGN(16) float m2[4];
00297 
00298     _mm_store_ps(m0, m[0].Data);
00299     _mm_store_ps(m1, m[1].Data);
00300     _mm_store_ps(m2, m[2].Data);
00301 
00302     return quatSIMD_cast_impl(m0, m1, m2);
00303 }
00304 
00305 template <typename T, precision P>
00306 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::fquatSIMD quatSIMD_cast
00307 (
00308     detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & m
00309 )
00310 {
00311     return quatSIMD_cast_impl(&m[0][0], &m[1][0], &m[2][0]);
00312 }

00316 (
00317     detail::tmat3x3<T, P> const & m

00320     return quatSIMD_cast_impl(&m[0][0], &m[1][0], &m[2][0]);

00323 
00324 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::fmat4x4SIMD mat4SIMD_cast
00325 (
00326         detail::fquatSIMD const & q
00327 )
00328 {
00329     detail::fmat4x4SIMD result;
00330 
00331     __m128 _wwww  = _mm_shuffle_ps(q.Data, q.Data, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00332     __m128 _xyzw  = q.Data;
00333     __m128 _zxyw  = _mm_shuffle_ps(q.Data, q.Data, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 1, 0, 2));
00334     __m128 _yzxw  = _mm_shuffle_ps(q.Data, q.Data, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 0, 2, 1));
00335 
00336     __m128 _xyzw2 = _mm_add_ps(_xyzw, _xyzw);
00337     __m128 _zxyw2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(_xyzw2, _xyzw2, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 1, 0, 2));
00338     __m128 _yzxw2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(_xyzw2, _xyzw2, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 0, 2, 1));
00339     
00340     __m128 _tmp0  = _mm_sub_ps(_mm_set1_ps(1.0f), _mm_mul_ps(_yzxw2, _yzxw));
00341            _tmp0  = _mm_sub_ps(_tmp0, _mm_mul_ps(_zxyw2, _zxyw));
00342 
00343     __m128 _tmp1  = _mm_mul_ps(_yzxw2, _xyzw);
00344            _tmp1  = _mm_add_ps(_tmp1, _mm_mul_ps(_zxyw2, _wwww));
00345 
00346     __m128 _tmp2  = _mm_mul_ps(_zxyw2, _xyzw);
00347            _tmp2  = _mm_sub_ps(_tmp2, _mm_mul_ps(_yzxw2, _wwww));
00348 
00349 
00350     // There's probably a better, more politically correct way of doing this...
00351     result[0].Data = _mm_set_ps(
00352         0.0f,
00353         reinterpret_cast<float*>(&_tmp2)[0],
00354         reinterpret_cast<float*>(&_tmp1)[0],
00355         reinterpret_cast<float*>(&_tmp0)[0]);
00356 
00357     result[1].Data = _mm_set_ps(
00358         0.0f,
00359         reinterpret_cast<float*>(&_tmp1)[1],
00360         reinterpret_cast<float*>(&_tmp0)[1],
00361         reinterpret_cast<float*>(&_tmp2)[1]);
00362 
00363     result[2].Data = _mm_set_ps(
00364         0.0f,
00365         reinterpret_cast<float*>(&_tmp0)[2],
00366         reinterpret_cast<float*>(&_tmp2)[2],
00367         reinterpret_cast<float*>(&_tmp1)[2]);
00368 
00369    result[3].Data = _mm_set_ps(
00370         1.0f,
00371         0.0f,
00372         0.0f,
00373         0.0f);
00374 
00375 
00376     return result;
00377 }

00389 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER float length
00390 (
00391         detail::fquatSIMD const & q
00392 )
00393 {
00394     return glm::sqrt(dot(q, q));
00395 }

00397 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::fquatSIMD normalize
00398 (
00399         detail::fquatSIMD const & q
00400 )
00401 {
00402     return _mm_mul_ps(q.Data, _mm_set1_ps(1.0f / length(q)));
00403 }

00405 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER float dot
00406 (
00407         detail::fquatSIMD const & q1,
00408         detail::fquatSIMD const & q2
00409 )
00410 {
00411     float result;
00412     _mm_store_ss(&result, detail::sse_dot_ps(q1.Data, q2.Data));
00413 
00414     return result;
00415 }
00416 
00417 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::fquatSIMD mix
00418 (
00419         detail::fquatSIMD const & x, 
00420         detail::fquatSIMD const & y, 
00421         float const & a
00422 )
00423 {
00424         float cosTheta = dot(x, y);
00425 
00426     if (cosTheta > 1.0f - glm::epsilon<float>())
00427     {
00428             return _mm_add_ps(x.Data, _mm_mul_ps(_mm_set1_ps(a), _mm_sub_ps(y.Data, x.Data)));
00429     }
00430     else
00431     {
00432         float angle = glm::acos(cosTheta);
00433         
00434         
00435         float s0 = glm::sin((1.0f - a) * angle);
00436         float s1 = glm::sin(a * angle);
00437         float d  = 1.0f / glm::sin(angle);
00438 
00439         return (s0 * x + s1 * y) * d;
00440     }
00441 }
00442 
00443 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::fquatSIMD lerp
00444 (
00445         detail::fquatSIMD const & x, 
00446         detail::fquatSIMD const & y, 
00447         float const & a
00448 )
00449 {
00450         // Lerp is only defined in [0, 1]
00451         assert(a >= 0.0f);
00452         assert(a <= 1.0f);
00453 
00454     return _mm_add_ps(x.Data, _mm_mul_ps(_mm_set1_ps(a), _mm_sub_ps(y.Data, x.Data)));
00455 }
00456 
00457 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::fquatSIMD slerp
00458 (
00459         detail::fquatSIMD const & x, 
00460         detail::fquatSIMD const & y, 
00461         float const & a
00462 )
00463 {
00464         detail::fquatSIMD z = y;
00465 
00466         float cosTheta = dot(x, y);
00467 
00468         // If cosTheta < 0, the interpolation will take the long way around the sphere. 
00469         // To fix this, one quat must be negated.
00470         if (cosTheta < 0.0f)
00471         {
00472                 z        = -y;
00473                 cosTheta = -cosTheta;
00474         }
00475 
00476         // Perform a linear interpolation when cosTheta is close to 1 to avoid side effect of sin(angle) becoming a zero denominator
00477         if(cosTheta > 1.0f - epsilon<float>())
00478         {
00479                 return _mm_add_ps(x.Data, _mm_mul_ps(_mm_set1_ps(a), _mm_sub_ps(y.Data, x.Data)));
00480         }
00481         else
00482         {
00483         float angle = glm::acos(cosTheta);
00484 
00485 
00486                 float s0 = glm::sin((1.0f - a) * angle);
00487         float s1 = glm::sin(a * angle);
00488         float d  = 1.0f / glm::sin(angle);
00489 
00490         return (s0 * x + s1 * y) * d;
00491         }
00492 }
00493 
00494 
00495 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::fquatSIMD fastMix
00496 (
00497         detail::fquatSIMD const & x, 
00498         detail::fquatSIMD const & y, 
00499         float const & a
00500 )
00501 {
00502         float cosTheta = dot(x, y);
00503 
00504     if (cosTheta > 1.0f - glm::epsilon<float>())
00505     {
00506             return _mm_add_ps(x.Data, _mm_mul_ps(_mm_set1_ps(a), _mm_sub_ps(y.Data, x.Data)));
00507     }
00508     else
00509     {
00510         float angle = glm::fastAcos(cosTheta);
00511 
00512 
00513         __m128 s  = glm::fastSin(_mm_set_ps((1.0f - a) * angle, a * angle, angle, 0.0f));
00514 
00515         __m128 s0 =                               _mm_shuffle_ps(s, s, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00516         __m128 s1 =                               _mm_shuffle_ps(s, s, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00517         __m128 d  = _mm_div_ps(_mm_set1_ps(1.0f), _mm_shuffle_ps(s, s, _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1)));
00518         
00519         return _mm_mul_ps(_mm_add_ps(_mm_mul_ps(s0, x.Data), _mm_mul_ps(s1, y.Data)), d);
00520     }
00521 }
00522 
00523 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::fquatSIMD fastSlerp
00524 (
00525         detail::fquatSIMD const & x, 
00526         detail::fquatSIMD const & y, 
00527         float const & a
00528 )
00529 {
00530         detail::fquatSIMD z = y;
00531 
00532         float cosTheta = dot(x, y);
00533         if (cosTheta < 0.0f)
00534         {
00535                 z        = -y;
00536                 cosTheta = -cosTheta;
00537         }
00538 
00539 
00540         if(cosTheta > 1.0f - epsilon<float>())
00541         {
00542                 return _mm_add_ps(x.Data, _mm_mul_ps(_mm_set1_ps(a), _mm_sub_ps(y.Data, x.Data)));
00543         }
00544         else
00545         {
00546         float angle = glm::fastAcos(cosTheta);
00547 
00548 
00549         __m128 s  = glm::fastSin(_mm_set_ps((1.0f - a) * angle, a * angle, angle, 0.0f));
00550 
00551         __m128 s0 =                               _mm_shuffle_ps(s, s, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00552         __m128 s1 =                               _mm_shuffle_ps(s, s, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00553         __m128 d  = _mm_div_ps(_mm_set1_ps(1.0f), _mm_shuffle_ps(s, s, _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1)));
00554         
00555         return _mm_mul_ps(_mm_add_ps(_mm_mul_ps(s0, x.Data), _mm_mul_ps(s1, y.Data)), d);
00556         }
00557 }
00558 
00559 
00560 
00561 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::fquatSIMD conjugate
00562 (
00563         detail::fquatSIMD const & q
00564 )
00565 {
00566         return detail::fquatSIMD(_mm_mul_ps(q.Data, _mm_set_ps(1.0f, -1.0f, -1.0f, -1.0f)));
00567 }
00568 
00569 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::fquatSIMD inverse
00570 (
00571         detail::fquatSIMD const & q
00572 )
00573 {
00574         return conjugate(q) / dot(q, q);
00575 }
00576 
00577 
00578 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::fquatSIMD angleAxisSIMD
00579 (
00580         float const & angle,
00581         vec3 const & v
00582 )
00583 {
00584 #ifdef GLM_FORCE_RADIANS
00585         float a(angle);
00586 #else
00587 #       pragma message("GLM: rotateZ function taking degrees as parameters is deprecated. #define GLM_FORCE_RADIANS before including GLM headers to remove this message.")
00588         float a(glm::radians(angle));
00589 #endif
00590         float s = glm::sin(a * 0.5f);
00591 
00592         return _mm_set_ps(
00593                 glm::cos(a * 0.5f),
00594                 v.z * s,
00595                 v.y * s,
00596                 v.x * s);
00597 }
00598 
00599 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::fquatSIMD angleAxisSIMD
00600 (
00601         float const & angle, 
00602         float const & x, 
00603         float const & y, 
00604         float const & z
00605 )
00606 {
00607         return angleAxisSIMD(angle, vec3(x, y, z));
00608 }
00609 
00610 
00611 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 fastSin(__m128 x)
00612 {
00613     static const __m128 c0 = _mm_set1_ps(0.16666666666666666666666666666667f);
00614     static const __m128 c1 = _mm_set1_ps(0.00833333333333333333333333333333f);
00615     static const __m128 c2 = _mm_set1_ps(0.00019841269841269841269841269841f);
00616 
00617     __m128 x3 = _mm_mul_ps(x,  _mm_mul_ps(x, x));
00618     __m128 x5 = _mm_mul_ps(x3, _mm_mul_ps(x, x));
00619     __m128 x7 = _mm_mul_ps(x5, _mm_mul_ps(x, x));
00620 
00621     __m128 y0 = _mm_mul_ps(x3, c0);
00622     __m128 y1 = _mm_mul_ps(x5, c1);
00623     __m128 y2 = _mm_mul_ps(x7, c2);
00624         
00625     return _mm_sub_ps(_mm_add_ps(_mm_sub_ps(x, y0), y1), y2);
00626 }
